content: Use pathlib.Path over os.path for file operations
Use httpx async client over requests for HTTP calls
MCP tools must return JSON-serializable dicts wrapped in result key
Always pass project path explicitly - never assume cwd
When implementing cross-platform features, verify hook support via web search first - Cursor has hooks (v1.7+), Windsurf has enterprise-only Cascade Hooks, VS Code Copilot and Gemini have no hooks

ACE METHODOLOGY CAPTURE: Before completing a task, ask 'What did I do differently that worked?' and add that methodology as a playbook bullet. This closes the ACE learning loop and teaches future models.

ACE enforcement should go beyond tool call gating - it should also enforce structured responses that capture HOW problems were solved, not just WHAT was found. This enables cross-model learning where Opus's debugging methodology becomes available to Haiku/Sonnet via playbook bullets.
